汯字的基本解释

汯
hóng
〔泓（
h巒g ）汯〕（水流）回旋的样子。

汯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《集韻》乎萌切，平耕，匣。］
(1)见“泓汯”。
(2)见“汯汩”。

汯字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汯； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页607第17
【集韻】乎萌切，音宏。汯汯，迅流也。與浤同。　又【玉篇】無舟涉水也。　又泓汯，水勢迴旋貌。【郭璞·江賦】泓汯泂澋。

汯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
汯字的起名意思

同“泓”指潭或湖，做量词时指清水一道，也可做形容词，形容水又深又广。

汯

h 張g )汯〕 (current) the state of swirling.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Ji Yun" is almost cute, flat plowing, box. ]
(1) See "Hong Miao".
(2) See "汯汩".
汯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　汯; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 607-17
[Jiyun] Almost cute and cut, sound macro.汯汯, fast flow also. The same as 浤.　[Jade articles] There is no boat wading.　Hung Ming again, the water is turning around. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Hong 汯汯泂澋.
汯
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Japanese Ming Dynasty
Korean Ming Dynasty
Old glyph
汯
Name meaning
The same as "hong" refers to pond or lake. When used as a measure word, it refers to clear water. It can also be used as an adjective to describe the depth and breadth of the water.
hóng
